allow: Bash(/c/msys64/usr/bin/bash.exe -lc "export PATH=/mingw64/bin:$PATH && cd /d/00code/nekoray && rm -rf build && cmake -G Ninja -S . -B build -DNKR_DISABLE_LIBS=1 2>&1")
Bash(/c/msys64/usr/bin/bash.exe -lc "export PATH=/mingw64/bin:$PATH && cd /d/00code/nekoray/build && ldd newbeeplus.exe | grep mingw64 | awk ''{print $3}'' | sort")
Bash(/c/msys64/usr/bin/bash.exe -c "PATH=/c/msys64/mingw64/bin:/c/msys64/usr/bin && cd /d/00code/nekoray/build && ldd newbeeplus.exe 2>/dev/null | grep mingw64 | awk ''{print $3}'' | sort")
Bash(/c/msys64/usr/bin/bash.exe -c 'PATH=/c/msys64/mingw64/bin:/c/msys64/usr/bin && cd /d/00code/nekoray/build && ldd newbeeplus.exe 2>/dev/null | grep mingw64 | awk ""{print \\$3}"" | sort')

Bash(/c/msys64/usr/bin/env.exe PATH=/c/msys64/mingw64/bin:/c/msys64/usr/bin /c/msys64/usr/bin/bash.exe -c "cd /d/00code/nekoray/build && ldd newbeeplus.exe | grep mingw64 | awk ''{print $3}'' | sort")

Bash(/c/msys64/usr/bin/env.exe PATH=/c/msys64/mingw64/bin:/c/msys64/usr/bin /c/msys64/usr/bin/bash.exe -c 'cd /d/00code/nekoray/build && ldd newbeeplus.exe | grep mingw64 | sed ""s/.*=> //"" | sed ""s/ \(.*\)//"" | while read dll; do cp -v ""$dll"" . ; done')

Bash(/c/msys64/usr/bin/env.exe PATH=/c/msys64/mingw64/bin:/c/msys64/usr/bin /c/msys64/usr/bin/bash.exe -c 'cd /d/00code/nekoray/build && mkdir -p platforms imageformats iconengines && cp -v /mingw64/share/qt5/plugins/platforms/qwindows.dll platforms/ && cp -v /mingw64/bin/Qt5Svg.dll . && cp -v /mingw64/share/qt5/plugins/imageformats/*.dll imageformats/ && cp -v /mingw64/share/qt5/plugins/iconengines/*.dll iconengines/')
